trans-unit.source: Enables you to enter the number of a purchase contract for the service limit.

seg-source.mrk: Enables you to enter the number of a purchase contract for the service limit.

target.mrk: 使您可以输入服务限制的采购合同编号。

trans-unit.source: You can use a purchase contract for limit in the following scenario, for example:

seg-source.mrk: You can use a purchase contract for limit in the following scenario, for example:

target.mrk: 例如，您可在以下场景中使用限制的采购合同。

trans-unit.source: You want to engage a service provider to repair a machine, but you do not yet know which services are required in detail.

seg-source.mrk: You want to engage a service provider to repair a machine, but you do not yet know which services are required in detail.

target.mrk: 您想聘请服务提供商维修机器，但您尚不知道需要哪些详细服务。

trans-unit.source: In a <emphasis>purchase contract</emphasis>, you define the potential set of services, that may be required, for example, for the maintenance and repair of a particular machine.

seg-source.mrk: In a <emphasis>purchase contract</emphasis>, you define the potential set of services, that may be required, for example, for the maintenance and repair of a particular machine.

target.mrk: 在<emphasis>采购合同</emphasis>中，您定义了可能需要的一组潜在服务，例如，用于维护和维修特定机器。

trans-unit.source: In the <emphasis>purchase order</emphasis> item, you create a limit item with product type group <cite>Service</cite>. You define the limit amounts (<cite>Overall Limit</cite> and <cite>Expected Value</cite>) and you assign the purchase contract to this limit by entering the number of the contract into the <uicontrol>Contract for Limit</uicontrol> field as the source of supply.

seg-source.mrk: In the <emphasis>purchase order</emphasis> item, you create a limit item with product type group <cite>Service</cite>.

You define the limit amounts (<cite>Overall Limit</cite> and <cite>Expected Value</cite>) and you assign the purchase contract to this limit by entering the number of the contract into the <uicontrol>Contract for Limit</uicontrol> field as the source of supply.

target.mrk: 在<emphasis>采购订单</emphasis>项目中，使用产品类型组<cite>服务</cite>创建限制项目。
定义限制金额（<cite>整体限制</cite>和<cite>预期值</cite>），然后通过在<uicontrol>限制的合同</uicontrol>字段中输入合同编号作为供货源来将采购合同分配到该限制。

trans-unit.source: In the service entry sheet that refers to this purchase order limit item, the number of the purchase contract is inserted automatically and the purchaser can select the relevant service items from the assigned contract. This ensures, that your company benefits from the prices negotiated in the purchase contract.

seg-source.mrk: In the service entry sheet that refers to this purchase order limit item, the number of the purchase contract is inserted automatically and the purchaser can select the relevant service items from the assigned contract.
This ensures, that your company benefits from the prices negotiated in the purchase contract.

target.mrk: 在参考此采购订单限制项目的服务条目表中，将自动插入采购合同数，且采购方可从已分配的合同中选择相关服务项目。
这确保贵公司将从采购合同中协商的价格中受益。
